thread.title: His father stood up to McCarthyism. This N.J. congressman shows no such courage | Editorial
thread.title_full: His father stood up to McCarthyism. This N.J. congressman shows no such courage | Editorial

author: Star-Ledger Editorial Board
title: His father stood up to McCarthyism. This N.J. congressman shows no such courage | Editorial
text: Rep. Rodney Frelinghuysen (R-11th Dist.) visits schools, attends church breakfasts and vets' clinics. He hosts tele-town halls by invitation. Nice. But the rest of his district, 640,000 strong, don't matter to him.
